events.name: Cricket Match
events.description: Come and support our cricket team by bringing posters and flyers during their match against the Warriors!

events.name: Soccer Match
events.description: Come and suppoer our soccer team during their game against the Wolves! Make sure to be loud!

events.name: Halloween Night
events.description: Come to school at 5 PM - 9PM to enjoy a halloween night! There will be movies, a costume contest, and more!

events.name: Movie Night
events.description: We all love movies. Come to school a 6 PM where we will have a ton of different movies playing in each of the classrooms. Choose which one you want to watch.

events.name: Boys Tennis Match
events.description: Come to school and support our boys tennis team against the Kraken!

events.name: Boys Basketball Game
events.description: Come and support your varsity boys basketball team as they go up against the Sharks in the state semifinal!

events.name: Boys Swim Meet
events.description: Our boys are excited for their quarterfinal matchup against the Mustangs! Come and support your school swim team!

events.name: Girls Badminton Match
events.description: Help support our girl’s badminton team by cheering for them at their match against the Sharks!

events.name: Boys Football Team
events.description: Support our boy’s football team in their match against the Dragons in the state final!

events.name: Food Fundraiser
events.description: Come and our ASB Leadership group by buying food our students make! We promise the food will be out of this world!

events.name: Cancer Research Auction
events.description: Join our auction where all proceeds will go towards cancer research at the University of Washington!

events.name: Game Night
events.description: After school in room 222 come and join us for a couple of hours of absolute fun. Game include Monopoly, Sorry, and more!

events.name: School Picnic
events.description: Join us during lunch for a school picnic where we will provide bagels, muffins, and more!

events.name: Spelling Bee
events.description: come participate in our school spelling bee! The winner will win a special prize!
